Which URL should I enter?
 Enter the URL to the root of your ownCloud installation - that is: the same URL you use to connect to your ownCloud via the browser.
(e.g.: https://myowncloud.com) 

 Can I use this app to connect to my ownCloud via http and not https ?
 No, that is not possible. The Notes-API requests username and password to be sent for each connection. If you used http, you would send these vital informations as plaintext. Not a good idea! 
(Why? Read this: "Man-in-the-middle"-Attack http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Man-in-the-middle_attack) 

 I have an ownCloud server with a self-signed certificate. Can I use this app for my server?
 Yes, you can - but not out-of-the-box. You have to specifically tell Android to accept your self-signed certificate. This is done by manually adding the servers certificate to Androids Key-Manager. 
See this tutorial on how to do that: http://aykit.org/sites/myownnotes.html
